member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Utils.DictionaryFromType(System.Object)
member.summary: Get the list of properties of an object
member.param: The object to retrieve properties of.
member.returns: A Dictionary with Property Name as the key and its corresponding Value

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Utils.GetPropertyValues(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Get the property values of a class based on the property names supplied
member.param: Properties names, as a list of strings
member.returns: The values of the specified properties, as a list

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Field.#ctor
member.summary: Class constructor with default values of 2-5 character field.

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Field.ValidationChecks
member.summary: Perform basic data validation : checks the field is not empty and that the number of characters is satisfied.

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Field.Validate
member.summary: Skeleton implementation of data verification designed to be overriden. Example verifies that the field only contains alphanumeric characters.
member.returns: True if conditions are satisfied, false otherwise.

member.name: T:BS1192.Fields.FileType
member.summary: Represents the file types that BS1192 can describe, such as M3 (3D models), CR (Clash rendition), etc

member.name: T:BS1192.Fields.FileType.BS1192_ModelFile
member.summary: Represents file types for drawings and models

member.name: T:BS1192.Fields.FileType.BS1192_Document
member.summary: Represents file types for documents

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.FileType.#ctor
member.summary: Build a BS1192 file type

member.name: T:BS1192.Fields.Revision
member.summary: Represents a revision following the BS1192 standard.

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Revision.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Build a BS1192-compatible revision
member.param: The major part of a revision. XX in example : PXX.yy
The minor part of a revision. yy in example : PXX.yy
The prefix of a revision. P in example L PXX.yy

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Revision.GetAsString
member.summary: Get the revision formatted as per BS1192.
member.returns: Returns a revision formatted as per BS1192. Example : P03.07 , where 03 is the major, 07 is the minor and P the prefix

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Revision.IncrementMinor
member.summary: Increments the minor part of the revision (yy in this example : PXX.yy)

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Revision.IncrementMajor
member.summary: Increments the major part of the revision (XX in this example : PXX.yy). Please note, it also resets the minor to 0 as per BS1192.

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Revision.SetMinor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the minor part of a revision to a specified integer value.
member.param: The integer to set minor to. Only accepts 0-99.

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Revision.SetMajor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the major part of a revision to a specified integer value.
member.param: The integer to set minor to. Only accepts 1-99.

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Revision.Reset
member.summary: Resets the revision to default values. prefix is P, major is 1, minor is 0 : P01.00

member.name: T:BS1192.Fields.Role
member.summary: Represents the role of an organisation as per BS1192.

member.name: P:BS1192.Fields.Role.CurrentRole
member.summary: The currently assigned role.

member.name: T:BS1192.Fields.Role.BS1192_Role
member.summary: A list of the supported BS1192 Role codes

member.name: F:BS1192.Fields.Role.BS1192_Role.A
member.summary: Architect

member.name: F:BS1192.Fields.Role.BS1192_Role.C
member.summary: Civil Engineer

member.name: F:BS1192.Fields.Role.BS1192_Role.Z
member.summary: General (non-disciplinary)

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Role.SetRole(BS1192.Fields.Role.BS1192_Role)
member.summary: Sets the current role to the specified one.
member.param: The role to set current one to.

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Role.#ctor
member.summary: Build a BS1192 Role.

member.name: M:BS1192.Fields.Suitability.#ctor
member.summary: Build a BS1192 Suitability.

member.name: M:BS1192.Deliverable.GetBS1192Name
member.summary: Get the BS1192-formatted name of the deliverable
member.returns: BS1192-formatted name of the deliverable, as string.

member.name: M:BS1192.Deliverable.GetFormattedName
member.summary: Get the formatted name of the deliverable, taking into account the required fields.
member.returns: Formatted name of the deliverable, as string.

member.name: M:BS1192.Deliverable.GetAllFieldValues
member.summary: Get the values of all the public properties
member.returns: The list of values for all the object's properties.
